1221111.content:
"Food. Your kind taste great." She licks her lips after she answers, clearly showing off her sharp white teeth.

You're taken aback by how candidly she answers. Your fear, which had started to subside came rushing back. Before you could do anything else though, the lioness wound her tail around you and pulled you closer, continuing to talk. "I love how warm and soft you are, the way you fill me up..." She trailed a claw gently around your jawline, stroking you.

"What do you think of that? Doesn't it sound nice? You could become a part of me- help me rule this forest."

You can't help but notice her powerful muscles and silky voice. You can't help but feel drawn to her, even as she talks about something too horrible for you to want to consider. As you think about this, the lioness awaits your answer.
1221111.title: "Food. Your kind taste great"

12211111.content:
You hate to say it, but there's a powerful allure to what this lioness is saying. She's beautiful in a way- with a lithe frame that towers over you, and gives her the power to do whatever she wants with you. Really, you're lucky that she deigned to even talk to you when she could have eaten you already if she so chose.

As these thoughts run through your mind, she lowers a paw down to your level and speaks.

"Climb into my paw, and I promise your life will serve a far greater purpose than it would otherwise."

You consider a while longer, but the lioness is patient, and does not rush you. If you do this, you'll almost certainly die, but...

With a sigh, you heave yourself into her paw, finding her pads cool to the touch. Your heart is pounding, and you realize that this is foolish, but before you can climb back down, the ground rushes away from you as the lioness lifts you and holds you up to her face. If you climb off now, you will fall and die, and she will probably eat you anyway. Perhaps now it would be best just to accept your fate, and enjoy the ride.

You turn back to face the lioness, who smiles down at you.

123.content:
Jone had droven all the way out to Tennessee country, which edged the Great Smoky Mountains, to watch his niece compete in a swimming competition. As he'd pull in the parking lot he'd check his clock, seeing it at eight-thirty-AM when he had to be here at one-PM, he sighed at his own impatience. The swimming building was located up a hill & was the last of structures, the Smoky Mountain Nature Reserve taking up the rest of any commercial or residential potential..
Jone noticed that there was a dirt path for a car leading up the hills & a 'No Trespassing' sign there with it, but the iron gate stopping cars was wide open, & this piqued his curiosity. Seeing no cameras, cars or people he'd decide to investigate, knowing it'll take his time up. Switching to four-wheel-drive he'd turn a sharp right that led him onto a steep upward road, it atleast was half a mile long!

...Going anyways through constant bumping & being bounced some he'd get near the top & stop as he started getting weird radio static. He'd try flipping channels just to have it follow, & yelling in annoyance he continued over the hill- it was steeper than how he went up & he slammed the breaks as now his car was slowly being dragged down it by gravity!

"I should've figured!" He hated on himself as he now was following the path & kept the car straight as it gradually gained speed, even on the brakes. Shooting down atleast halfway the path was covered over with treetops & slowly straightened out, Jone barely stopping as his car slid around in mud & almost hit a tree.
Flipping his lights on in the slightly-navigable spot he'd see he could turn right, but his car, he knew, won't make it up that hill.
Agitated he'd ruin his day by following impulse past a Trespassing sign he continued & turned his car down the path- he figured if it was started by people it ends with people..

This path angled downward into one of the Smoky Canyons, unfortunately still covered over with tree's. Jone's radio intensified, "Shad'up!" He hit it lightly before looking up in shock & stopping-
There was a bowl of dirt making a huge hill with many huge trees covering it, nothing but darkness down the path that had to enter a massive cavern atleast eight feet tall, he judged from the steepness & the.. Sheer width. Despite getting a gut feeling be should NOT go- he did!

The headlights illuminated a mossy stone ground as he drove down the eighty-feet pathway, the static immediately stopping once he was driving on the moss.
Ahead the ground was unnaturally flat & still covered in moss, & all he saw in the distance was some light coming through holes at the top, he judged the cave to be likely a-hundred feet long! He'd turn his car right & it would illuminate the cave wall barely-

-A massive pile of tree-trunks were stacked like a square brick atleast twenty feet tall.. They looked machine-cut to Jone as he drove around it, finding a depression full of discarded, burned logs in a long pit.
He'd put the car in park & step out as it faced the cave, taking in a breath of the fresh air. "Definently not a normal cave.." He mumbled to himself & saw moss was cleared atleast fifteen feet from the logs- "Is anyone here!?"

13.content:
Deep in the African scrublands, you lurk in the branches of a massive baobab tree, watching your quarry as he walks by.

A brown-haired human male, most likely a tourist, based on his garb and light skin, has been wandering through the bush for hours. He's clearly lost, but you've been tailing him for a while now, making sure that no help will reach him. His khaki shorts and white T-shirt have been ripped and torn by sharp branches and thorns, and the man's starting to stumble from lack of water. You grin to yourself-the time has come.

Standing at 9 feet, 6 inches tall, you tower over the 5'8" man. Your sandy yellow fur is a creamy white on your stomach and around your face, allowing you to blend in with the tall grass of the savannah. Your tail, about 3 feet long, twitches like a thing alive, eager to start the hunt, and your claws, each about half an inch claw, sheath and unsheathe as you patiently wait for the man to get closer.

In terms of body, you're a knockout: each of your two breasts are the size of large watermelons, and your butt is just behind them in size. You wear a layer of fat from your previous hunts, making you soft and curvy, but it's still easy to see the muscles rippling underneath your skin. Your stomach growls a bit, but you hold your gut in your paws and massage it gently. You haven't eaten in a few days, and you need to find something to eat soon. You start to crouch, getting yourself into a pouncing position as the man walks beneath your perch. This one's going to feel good in your stomach...

Suddenly, you hear a human-like laugh, causing all of your fur to stand on end. Hyenas. Those damn predators will beat you to your meal! About to leap down, you stop for a minute. If one hyena's nearby, there will surely be the rest of its pack: far more meat than one scrawny human. Perhaps you could eat them instead and keep the man around for later-you could use a mate, after all, and you could just eat him later.

Eight large hyenas have appeared from the undergrowth, circling the man. As he backs up against the baobab tree, you can hear him whimpering in fear.

What should you do?
13.title: You stalk a human, you're only a foot or two bigger

131.content:
Like the vicious beasts that surrounded the man you were famished after having not eaten for a few days, but few of the hyenas you know will fill you for perhaps two despite their thin but bulky frames. It seems best to keep him alive- for now. This environment isn't hard hunting in most of the year plus having offspring is best for long-term survival, your mind thinks best. You watched them close in around him & were slightly entertained watching the helplessness, his whimpers.

As they got close enough you pounce. You fell down perhaps twenty-so feet & slammed both of your legs into a hyena's back, snapping it instantly. The man screamed incessantly almost over the hyenas yells, but hadn't ran away as three of the hyenas charged at you. You roared lowly before lunging at the nearest one. This one was severely outmatched as you sunk your claws into it's neck, throwing your nearly 500 pounds of weight on it & crushing it's body. Recovering with a roll you saw that four of the hyenas were going for the man, him yelling in panic & trying to run to just end up falling & his ankle twisting. The other two came for you & with the superior athletics you have you sprint on all fours, leaping over the ones coming for you to save the man-!
It was instinct now to slaughter these prey as they threatened what you consider a temporary new 'member' to your non-existent pack, which you did with ferocity. You reached them quick & would barely miss grabbing one, watching it jump back & try to lunge for you!

Kicking your leg back you end up slamming ones face, sending it tumbling over it's fellow member. The one lunging at you turned out to be the Alpha- you dispatched it by hastily bringing both your hands to it's neck, slamming it on the ground like the other.. The hyenas near the man kept yelling, yelping & laughing as you destroyed half their pack. You roared again & watched as they scattered off East, the dazed-injured one looking back longer before going.. Then you turned around toward the man.

He looked to try & back away with mostly his left leg & arms, looking terrified, pale. You knew that he was hurt judged by his ankle protruding outward, dehydration prominent to. Knowing he is weak solidified your desire to bear stronger offspring, you would walk to him on both feet, watching his cowardice shift in uncertainty as your stomach rumbled. "Please- don't.. Dont kill me-!" 'Kill' was a word you knew & you had no desire to.. At the moment. You showed that by grabbing his un-spraint leg & pulling him with you toward the hyena nearest, ignoring his terrified & pained pleads, then moving opposite of him. The guy looked on at you in a flurry of emotion, mostly fear, as you looked back at him while kneeling over the hyena.. Primal you were as you carelessly used your claws to start tearing open it's ribcage, him looking away & appearing sickened, his whimpering almost done.. Hastily ripping innards was a quite grotesque thing you love doing, your tail swaying as you gleefully praise your own skill, chomping down on mouthfulls of food & dirtying some of your facial fur & hands, which are more like paws that look like them.

That hyena was eaten hastily within several minutes, you taking a deep gasp as you swallowed the last of what's preferred in it.. He spoke. "What.. Tc-- re you gonna do?" A pained question by him- you barely understand, at most you know he is scared of you, dehydrated & hurt as to where he cannot walk. You saw he store into your green catlike eyes to see the blood of the kills on you as you saw defeat in him.. You then would walk over to him as the food settled in your stomach, seeing him slowly grow fearful again as you approached his side & bent down some, feeble effort done to move away. "No-! God No!"
Trying to push you away was in vain as he was weak & barely stood up past your navel, if he could. You would force a paw opposite of your face on his cheek, forcing him to stare at you whilst trembling. "Do.. Me?" Atleast thought of rationally, he looked puzzled- what your meaning is mating. Smiling.. Was like bearing your sharp teeth to him, he was a bit scared from it, now not as much.. It amazes you how quickly your instinct switched from kill to preserve however- even your conscious mind feels weird.

So you carefully brought your snout-like face to his cheek, sniffing in his.. Somewhat sweaty & stinky stench before licking him. He would turn away & groan- "Phla- gross.." You let out a purr-growl as you moved to one of the other dead hyenas; dragging it toward you & him & devouring it just like the last, you watched him sit there faced away.

.....You finished two & felt full, having eaten quite a few pounds of their innards.. Now you knew that water was a necessity given fact your fur is blood-soaked in specific spots & the human is dehydrated- thankfully your den is well placed near a source. It is rather isolated at the scrubland's mountain border in a valley where many predators have been killed by you- explaining why you haven't eaten. Many animals are avoiding that valley.
Only problem is the valley is about two miles North, two you'll be carrying your mate with, which will probably be only a little more strenuous. Though a bit irrate knowing you have to you don't care to much- you ate today & got a partner.. Perhaps a later snack as a bonus. He likely knows he has no choice but to submit now.
Forcing him on his back with sheathed claws you watch as he looked at you quietly, only grunting & moaning in pain as you forced your hands under him.. Then lifting, his weight actually wasn't bad, maybe like sixty pounds to you. Staring down at him your tail sways in anticipation for tonight, he feels more.. secure you can see. It's what you want- easier to manipulate.. Perhaps he sees your beauty, but then again your just a humanoid-anthropomorphic thinly-furred in-places-lioness hunting to live.. He likely sees that, or has become infatuated with being 'saved' by you. Who knows- all you know is he is quiet & just staring at you & the environment, you beginning the trek back to your den near a pond..

Soon, you'd be the size of a city. Then two cities. Then four. Then eight. This would continue, your power and size exponentially increasing as time went on, until you were the size of a continent. Then the Earth itself. Then the solar system.

Even though you didn't really need worship, you loved it nonetheless, each praying human feeding you with their prayers, unknowingly bolstering your already deific powers and size. The humans worshipped you willingly, of course - forced worship was lacklustre or tainted by excessive amounts of fear. Not that the humans didn't fear you, many did. It was just that most of those humans just happened to worship you.

Your tail swishes back and forth as it lengthens slightly, your godlike form expanding ever so slightly as you absorbed the prayers from the untold thousands worshipping your glory.

There was just one thing. A particular thing that you repeated to yourself every day, to remind yourself of your goddess-ly nature, and how it should be. You were...
1543.title: The Lioness Goddess

15433.content:
"Bigger," you hum, the word rumbling out of your throat as you purr. "Make me bigger, little ones. Bigger!"

You couldn't entirely recall what had happened before the day that the first human had made contact with you; of course, you were only fifty or so feet back then, wandering the countryside in a bit of an amnesiac daze. The moment that female human had caught sight of you roaming in the wilderness, she had dropped almost instantly to her knees and begun worshiping you, her head down low to the earth.

That was the moment you felt it run up and down your spine, followed by a surging rush of warmth, unlike any pleasure you had ever known. You'd only really grown an inch, but even that little tickly increase drove you wild! Whatever your past had been, it couldn't have mattered less to you now. Now, you were growing into a lioness of such magnitude that your breasts alone outclassed buildings!

you've been leaning into the past day, your colossal female hips widening, your furry rump pumping heavier and fuller across the streets below. Your 650-foot body trembles worse as the chants go on--at least, more so then any point thus far; you'd given half the crowd the night off, so they could rest their throats and eyes, while the more enthusiastic night owls remained to keep worshiping you.

But now there was more of a crowd than ever before! Inch after inch pulses into you, as you feel hundreds and hundreds of he more-brazen types rub up against your tremendous feet, countless little human hands caressing the bulging leathery pads as the grow and grow. 670 feet...675...680...690...

With a rather sudden tingle and a grunt, you feel yourself burst a good deal larger, in one rude, (and utterly wonderful) spurt of growth, your hips crashing into the sides of the city block you now-all-too-easily cover, pushing the facades of small offices and restaurants until they crackle and cave in against your surging furry body. The littles collectively gasp and cheer, especially those who were hugging your feet; the crowd now wiggles under or flat-up against your heels as you grow more and more, many wriggling up in between your swelling toes. The wild, unprecedented surge slows, leaving you wide-eyed and beaming as you look your 740-foot body over. You were getting used to growing inch by inch, the last few days--time-elapsed newsfeeds had already shown you were smoothly growing by the hour--but this was new. This was dozens of feet.

This...was excellent. You must have hit some new peak in your powers, smashed through some plateau in your intake! From day two, you had assumed (with poorly-restrained, gleeful arousal) you would eventually become unfathomably immense...but to know the process was speeding up--that you could gulp now, instead of merely sip...

"MORE!" you boom, shaking the city, as your tail swishes about luxuriously. "My little ones, chant more! Make me greater! Stronger! Make...me...BIGGER!!!"

The possibilities flood into your mind, filling your every thought, as your huge fingers snuggle in a "V" around your sex, milking up and down against the titanic lips. The chanting grows louder, more frenzied, as windows to the un-ruined buildings fly open, and more and more tiny humans chant praises to you, waving and smiling!

"YESSSS," you purr, gritting your teeth, as you tense up tremendously, your toes curling in on reflex, mooshing the caught littles gently,before you whine and blow up to 900 whopping feet...th-then 930...970! 1,000!!!

As you growl and flick your feline ears, you detect the approaching sound of tires crunching over asphalt; forcing one pleasure-laden eye open some, you see several trucks have roared up near you, adorned with speakers. A hiss of feedback stabs your ears, irritating you just for a milisecond, before another crushing wave of hot, aroused joy flows through your bulging body, and you lurch up another 100 feet! Gods, it was b-building faster!!!

"For you, our lioness goddess," a DJ-style voice erupts from the speakers. "We have translated worship from new fans around the world, who've all seen your growth spurts on the news! Enjoy, and grow!" At that, the speakers begin blaring nonstop, long-distance worship, and oh, how your eyes roll back in your growing skull, your breasts almost doubling in mass, overlfowing your hands as they cup and rub the swollen nipples, which burn and inflate larger, pleading like mad for release, as you SURRRGGGGE even larger...and larger...and larger...

1552.content:
For years, local folklore has included sightings of some giant beast hiding in the woods. When the tourists weren’t listening, the citizens of the small town would whisper to each about a giant living in the forest, feeding on those that dared trespass on its territory. Nobody completely believed the myths, but then again, nobody could explain the frequent disappearances either; every year, dozens of brave tourists travelled into the wilderness, never to return again. When authorities banned access to the forest, the disappearances stopped for a while… until people living on the edge of the wilderness started being found missing from their beds, their windows smashed open from the outside, as if a giant hand had reached in and snatched them away in the night. You were deeply intrigued by these events, and, on a day when you felt you had nothing left to lose, you travelled deep into the wilderness to find the truth. What you discovered changed your life.

After weeks of starving while travelling the forests, living off berries and streams, you were starting to give up… until you found her. A huge, slumbering giantess, her size taking up an entire field -- you figure she must be at least 5 stories tall! You circled her for hours, admiring every inch of her perfect body. The giantess seemed to be some kind of hybrid, in fact; with blonde fur, a long tail, and a lion-like snout. When she woke up to find you staring at her, you thought that she would kill you for sure… but she hesitated. She was used to her prey screaming and running away on the sight of her, but you, on the other hand, were just standing there... complimenting her? She was obviously hungry, but also lonely and desperate for a companion. As the two of you spoke, you realize the poor woman hasn’t had anybody to talk to in decades. You’re the only person that ever gave her the time of day, and thus, she quickly became obsessed with you.

And now, she has a bonafide hatred for every human -- except you.

Naturally, your influence over her has given you ample opportunities to realize some of your… fantasies. While she prefers to chew her food, she has since agreed to swallow her prey whole and alive just to please you, letting you watched as woodland critter and the occasional hikers get sucked down her cavernous throat, and letting you grind against her huge, soft belly as they digested within. She’s even learned to enjoy it herself, as time goes by; savoring her squirming meals a little more each time. In the end, though, your kink has only been a small part of your relationship. Gulping down a few unlucky campers was just something nice she did as a treat for you every so often. Indeed, for the most part, the two of you just doted on eachother, alone in the woods, where the two of you can’t be judged by the prying eye of society at large.

You’ve been together for months, and you were still bother enraptured by eachother, your love, while superficial, undying. During the days, she would carry you around through the forests, keeping you cradled between her soft breasts, as you chatted and helped eachother find food and water. While she didn’t seem to want to talk about her past, she loved hearing you tell stories about life in human society; and for the most part, the two of you felt like a normal couple. Though, the sexual aspect of your relationship was a little unorthodox. Mutual masturbation was about the best you could do sometimes, given your size difference; beyond that, you had to get creative. Being a giantess fan, you were content with just worshipping every inch of her body; however, you sometimes wished you were big enough to truly, personally satisfy her.

Still, the two of you lived an idyllic life, as far as you were concerned. It helps that you were always a bit of an outdoorsy person, and enjoyed being alone with her in the wide expanse of nature. You, yourself, lived in a large cabin out in the middle of the woods, after you had the lioness swallow its previous occupants. Every morning, you wake up, get ready, and lean out the window to see your lover’s huge, smiling face staring back at you. She’d snatch you right up from the window sill sometimes, adorably excited to begin the day’s adventures. Still, you sometimes missed the luxuries of your home town. The two of you have agreed that you can’t hide forever, and at night, you often dream of ruling one of the small towns in the wilderness hand-in-hand.

Whatever you decide on, soon, this little neck of the woods was never going to be the same...
